channel.title: [pi]really could use help here![pi]
channel.description:
!!PROJECT INSANITY!! lets start off with saying that i'm creating a "f2p" based server with "member" benefits such as being able to wield a members item like Dragon Claws...
so anyways i was wondering if one of you guys could help me with making it so if you are a member and you go into the "wildy" and are wielding a members weapon, armour, and any other members items you would not be able to attack a non-member player.
to shorten things up ...
(this is some bullshit that makes so sense) if member = true check for members item in slots if members item is found then attack non-member player = false.

item.title: [pi]really could use help here![pi]
item.dc:creator: @tyler28852 tyler28852
item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

@sticky
i honestly don’t care if i get alot of players but i see where you’re coming from.

@ashton51
i have done that already, i want to make it fair in the wilderness if you have an item that is members only then you cannot attack a player that does not have a members only item.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]really could use help here![pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Why not just make it so they can’t even wield dragon claws in the first place if they are not a donator?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]really could use help here![pi]
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

dude will you server really be playable how wil lpeople level fast …
sos its not your answer but i disagree with your idea

@tyler28852 wrote:

!!PROJECT INSANITY!!
lets start off with saying that i’m creating a “f2p” based server with “member” benefits such as being able to wield a members item like Dragon Claws…

so anyways i was wondering if one of you guys could help me with making it so if you are a member and you go into the “wildy” and are wielding a members weapon, armour, and any other members items you would not be able to attack a non-member player.

if member = true
check for members item in slots
if members item is found
then attack non-member player = false.
